001package imagingbook.lib.util.progress.ij;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import imagingbook.lib.util.progress.ProgressMonitor;
005import imagingbook.lib.util.progress.ProgressReporter;
006
007/**
008 * An instance of this class monitors the progress of another object (task)
009 * by querying its status periodically.
010 * TODO: Make the associated action more generic (currently progress information is 
011 * used to update ImageJ's peogress bar.
012 * @author WB
013 *
014 */
015public class ProgressBarMonitor extends ProgressMonitor {
016        
017        private final boolean ijRunning;
018        private boolean ijUpdateProgressBar = true;
019        
020        public ProgressBarMonitor(ProgressReporter target) {
021                super(target);
022                this.ijRunning = (IJ.getInstance() != null);
023        }
024
025        @Override
026        public void handleProgress(double progress, long nanoTime) {
027                if (ijRunning && ijUpdateProgressBar) {
028                        IJ.showProgress(progress);
029                }
030                
031        }
032
033}
